choices.name: duplicate
choices.choiceText: To an existing Activation Line with the same number (duplicate numbers allowed)

choices.name: existingLines
choices.choiceText: To a New Number on an existing Activation Line

choices.name: pool
choices.choiceText: To a New number in the pool of free numbers on the Account

fields.name: text
fields.fieldText: Please choose the second number that you want to change the first selected number to.

fields.name: nonJoinedText
fields.fieldText: These numbers do not have an Activation Line assignment yet. Please feel free to pick a number from the pool of numbers on the Account.

fields.name: deactivateMessage
fields.fieldText: The Phone Number Reservation is deactivated

fields.name: swapNumbersText
fields.fieldText:
Click Next if you would like to swap phone numbers between Activations Lines or change from pool of numbers.


Make a selection if you are swapping between New Numbers or Ported Numbers

fields.name: noPoolText
fields.fieldText: There are no free assignments. Go back and load more numbers from the Open Series.

fields.name: NumbersTextNoNewNumbers
fields.fieldText: There are no New numbers to swap. Finish or choose Previous to change to Ported Numbers

fields.name: NumbersTextNoPortedNumbers
fields.fieldText: There are no ported numbers to swap. Finish or choose Previous to change to New Numbers

fields.name: chooseFirstNumber
fields.fieldText:
Choose if you want to swap to a number on an existing Activation Line or to a number from a pool of numbers on the Account.


Please choose the first number from an Activation Line.

fields.name: From_where_do_you_want_to_switch_the_number
fields.fieldText: To where do you want to switch the number?

fields.name: chooseFirstNumberPorted
fields.fieldText:
﻿Choose the first Activation Line with a ported number that you would like to swap from.


In the next step you choose the existing Activation Line with ported number that you would like to swap to.

fields.name: chooseSecondNumber
fields.fieldText: Choose the second number to swap with the first selected number. These are numbers already assigned on the same Activation.

validationRule.errorMessage: You cannot swap to the same number.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_chooseSecondNumber
fields.fieldText: Choose the second number to swap with the first selected ported number. These are numbers already assigned on the same Activation.

validationRule.errorMessage: You cannot swap to the same number.
